text: Today, I'm giddy+grateful. Giddy cos ☃️ #NYCSnow & grateful my husband (EM Doc) received #CovidVaccine. 300,000+ ppl died from #COVID19; the light @ the end of the tunnel begins not just w/ this #vaccine, but also w/ unity, responsibility & compassion 4 others. #hindsightis2020 https://t.co/OFsS12gjwy
